reference.title: ERXSTATUS_EL1, Selected Error Record Primary Status Register, EL1
reference.shortdesc: Register ERXSTATUS_EL1 accesses the ERR<n>STATUS primary status register for the error record selected by ERRSELR_EL1.SEL.

section.p: If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==0, then ERXSTATUS_EL1 accesses the ERR0STATUS register of the core error record. See ERR0STATUS, Error Record Primary Status RegisterThe ERR0STATUS contains information about the error record..
If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==1, then ERXSTATUS_EL1 accesses the ERR1STATUS register of the DSU error record. See the Arm DynamIQ Shared Unit Technical Reference Manual.
